articles.title: Delhi News Live Updates: Farmers stopped from entering Delhi, claims BKU; ‘protest to intensify if demands not met’

articles.title: "Arvind Kejriwal My Guru, Won't Betray Him," Says Manish Sisodia: 10 Facts
articles.description: Delhi Chief Minister and Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) national convenor Arvind Kejriwal embarked on a two-day visit to poll-bound Gujarat from today. This is Mr Kejriwal's fifth visit to the state in less than a month; he is accompanied by Manish Sisodia.
articles.content: <li>Delhi's Deputy Chief Minister Manish Sisodia, in the eye of a political storm over corruption allegations, today doubled down on his sensational claims against the BJP. "I got a message. It had t… [+3488 chars]

articles.title: "You're Messing With Wrong People": KCR's Daughter After BJP's Charge
articles.description: The BJP on Sunday alleged that Telangana Chief Minister K Chandrashekar Rao's daughter and MLC K Kavitha was the "middleman" between the liquor mafia and the Aam Aadmi Party government in the Delhi Excise Policy case.
articles.content:
Ms Kavitha said that the BJP is "rattled" by criticism from KCR.
